title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - 239 Rua Vistosa
title_short: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - 239 Rua Vistosa
description: Park lot day and night free of charge.

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - 30C4 Rua Dona Leonor de Freitas
title_short: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - 30C4 Rua Dona Leonor de Freitas
description: Huge free parking lot no facilities but with asphalt and flat

title: (4400-017) Vila Nova de Gaia - 61 Travessa Conselheiro Veloso da Cruz
title_short: (4400-017) Vila Nova de Gaia - 61 Travessa Conselheiro Veloso da Cruz
description: Launderette

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia -
description: Level parking with light and views of the city nearby homes

title: (4400-037) Vila Nova de Gaia - 72 Rua Senhor de Matosinhos
title_short: (4400-037) Vila Nova de Gaia - 72 Rua Senhor de Matosinhos
description: Big parking surrounded by buildings. We slept super good at night here.

title: (4400-161) Vila Nova de Gaia - 710 Avenida de Ramos Pinto
title_short: (4400-161) Vila Nova de Gaia - 710 Avenida de Ramos Pinto
description: Parking to enjoy the city rather well placed. Bike path very close and bridge to cross the Douro too. Open 24 hours, we parked there for a short day to visit Porto. Rather good price level and considering the comments of the free parking lots (broken window car). 2m20/2m30 with roof terrace parking for trucks. Exit a little narrow, it goes well with a van, bigger I'm not sure. No payment by credit card.

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 72 Rua Luís de Camões
title_short: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 72 Rua Luís de Camões
description: Parking of the General Torres railway station. Just to leave ac during the day.

title: (4400-141) Vila Nova de Gaia - 188 Rua Fernandes dos Anjos
title_short: (4400-141) Vila Nova de Gaia - 188 Rua Fernandes dos Anjos
description: Automatic laundry. The owner is on site. He speaks French and English. He is very friendly and will help you understand how it works. Washing machine, Dryer. Reading and coffee machine on site. WiFi available too.

title: (4430-175) Vila Nova de Gaia - 50 Rua Cândido dos Reis
title_short: (4430-175) Vila Nova de Gaia - 50 Rua Cândido dos Reis
description: Laundromat Sabao Rosa

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 35-159 Rua Fervença
title_short: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 35-159 Rua Fervença
description: Warnung- only for small vans! Very narrow streets! Great parking lot to explore Porto. felt safe and slept well as it got surprisingly quiet after midnight! Small camper is a must - still tight but were perfectly instructed by the park attendant!

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 35 Rua Jau
title_short: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 35 Rua Jau
description: We found this small parking by chance in a dead end, on the edge of zone 1, the cheapest. Pitch only for vehicle not too long and easily manoeuvrable. Douro River, bridge to the city center and Porto cellars, accessible in 15-20 minutes on foot. Maximum duration of 4 hours renewable, but possibility of doing it remotely with an easy-to-use application (real bargain!). Stayed the day and early evening, no security concerns about us.

title: (4404-503) Vila Nova de Gaia -
description: Perfect for spending the night, it also has 5ghz wifi from the continent, you have to get close to your establishment for a better connection.

title: (4400-103) Vila Nova de Gaia - 66 Avenida dos Descobrimentos
title_short: (4400-103) Vila Nova de Gaia - 66 Avenida dos Descobrimentos
description: Parking at LIDL and near a Leroy Merlin and a Makro.

title: (4430-069) Vila Nova de Gaia - 347 Rua Quinta Pedras
title_short: (4430-069) Vila Nova de Gaia - 347 Rua Quinta Pedras
description: Found by chance in Vila Nova de Gaia, this paid parking on the street or in your own car park is located in a quiet area less than 15' on foot from the famous Dom Luis bridge or the Porto cellars. We left our motorhome there for 6 hours without worries. €2.60 for 4 hours to be paid on your mobile, possibility of extending remotely. In short, a good plan to easily access this part of Porto.

title: (4400-232) Vila Nova de Gaia - 305 Rua Nova do Fojo
title_short: (4400-232) Vila Nova de Gaia - 305 Rua Nova do Fojo
description: At the Auchan gas station there is water to fill the motorhome for free, nearby is Mercadona and Alcampo

title: (4000-509) Porto -
description: Drinking water, right next to the road, almost under the bridge

title: (4400-241) Vila Nova de Gaia - 310 Rua Particular de Santo António
title_short: (4400-241) Vila Nova de Gaia - 310 Rua Particular de Santo António
description: Parking behind the department store. convenient parking a short distance behind the Gaiashopping department store.  evening and morning traffic due to supply, but otherwise a good place with access to shopping and public transport to get to the center.

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - 426 Cais do Cavaco
title_short: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - 426 Cais do Cavaco
description: Parking space along the street. Too narrow for CCs, convenient for trucks and vans. Free parking and 25 minutes walk from the quays of Gaia. Great view of the Douro!

title: (4400-322) Canidelo - 946 Rua Tenente Valadim
description:
Automatic Laundry and dryer
Machine up to 19kg Open 8h-23h

title: (4430-207) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2155 Avenida da República
title_short: (4430-207) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2155 Avenida da República
description:
Free parking 10min by metro from the center of Porto. Ideal for visiting the city!
We arrived around 8am to be sure to have room!

title: (4000-013) Porto - 9 Rua do Corpo da Guarda
title_short: (4000-013) Porto - 9 Rua do Corpo da Guarda
description: Trash can and water fountain right in front of Sé Cathedral. There is also plenty of parking space for small vehicles and VAN n (no motorhome). However, be careful with parking.

title: (4000) Porto - 262 Rua de Mouzinho da Silveira
title_short: (4000) Porto - 262 Rua de Mouzinho da Silveira
description: Parking on the street, on Rua de Mouzinho da Silveira, steep and noisy but obviously one of the safest places to park at night and be able to leave the AC for the day to go around. Everything close. There are no explicit prohibition signs, from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. you have to put parking every 2 hours. I stayed one night and day and received no fines or warnings. Security in Porto is important, many car parks with a history of theft but here it does not seem to be easy for thieves. If you want tranquility this is NOT the place.

title: (4050-367) Porto - 135 Rua de São Bento da Vitória
title_short: (4050-367) Porto - 135 Rua de São Bento da Vitória
description: Free parking day and night, near the beautiful monuments of Porto on foot and the center. The car park is in an area surrounded by restaurants, cafes and shopping centers with wifi, toilets and water points.

address.street: 135 Rua de São Bento da Vitória

title: (4000) Porto - 90 Avenida Gustavo Eiffel
description: On the roadside but with a view of the Douro and 1.5 km from the Louis Bridge (beginning of the city center) The most practical place in Porto! Accessible to all motorhomes because there is no marking on the ground. Fountains along the sidewalk, swimming possible at the bottom of the cliff. (accessible by stairs). It remains a noisy roadside. Please note that access is closed every Sunday, reserved for bicycles and pedestrians.

title: (4050-076) Porto - 9 Rua De Azevedo De Albuquerque
title_short: (4050-076) Porto - 9 Rua De Azevedo De Albuquerque
description: Parking in the center of Porto. Busy but quiet area. Free overnight parking. During the day you must put a ticket every 2 hours

title: (4400-087) Vila Nova de Gaia - 172 Cais do Cavaco
title_short: (4400-087) Vila Nova de Gaia - 172 Cais do Cavaco
description: Free daytime parking above the Douro. Here you can park on the shoulder of a moderately busy road, both in the sun and in the shade. Best location for walking to the center of Porto (2.5 km). The pitches are more suitable for campers or small teams.

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 1 Rua 1
description: Good parking with a view, I do not know for overnight stay, just over the main street, very empty, city is within a few minutes walk.

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 9 Rua 1
description: This is free parking near the river. Good for parking and staying 1 night. No service but close to the bridge to Porto.

title: (4000) Porto - 95 Rua dos Caldeireiros
description: Laundry in downtown area of Porto, prices are not cheap but it works well and the place is very neat. Prices include detergent and fabric softener. It works from 7:00 to 00:00 from Monday to Monday.

title: (4000-098) Porto - 28 Passeio das Fontainhas
description: Roadside parking in a cul-de-sac. Access via narrower streets. Very empty even on a Saturday and there were a few vacancies. Busy with cars during the day during the week. Above is a paid parking lot with other large parking spaces.

title: (4050-290) Porto - 26 Rua de São Filipe de Nery
title_short: (4050-290) Porto - 26 Rua de São Filipe de Nery
description: Guarded parking garage. Super central.

address.street: 26 Rua de São Filipe de Nery

title: (4400-517) Vila Nova de Gaia -
description: Motorhome pitch in the parking lot of the Gaïa Jardin shopping center, there is a pharmacy, washing machine, supermarket, fast food, and car maintenance store. Huge car park under video surveillance. Be careful, however, of the barriers at night, which makes it very quiet. Two possible entries, one with height limit and the other not.

title: (4405-034) Vila Nova de Gaia - 128 Rua Maurício Lourenço de Oliveira
title_short: (4405-034) Vila Nova de Gaia - 128 Rua Maurício Lourenço de Oliveira
description: On street parking. Slept safe for one night. Noisy from the road, but useful for visiting the garage in the morning. Bus nearby to get into town.

title: (4400) São Pedro da Afurada - 1168 Alameda Jardins da Arrábida
title_short: (4400) São Pedro da Afurada - 1168 Alameda Jardins da Arrábida
description: Large parking a little far from the center but very quiet. A good alternative to parking on the river where there are many people and a lot of retirees who do not support the sound after 19 h 30.

title: (4000-054) Porto - 75 Rua de Alexandre Herculano
description: 3 washing machines and 2 dryers

title: (4400-667) Vila Nova de Gaia - 3421 Rua Jordão
title_short: (4400-667) Vila Nova de Gaia - 3421 Rua Jordão
description: Gas station with free air and water

title: (4400-438) Vila Nova de Gaia - 297 Avenida Professor Orlando Ribeiro
title_short: (4400-438) Vila Nova de Gaia - 297 Avenida Professor Orlando Ribeiro
description:
Great laundry facility with a plug for charging and wifi while you wait. Attendant was very helpful and spoke good English.

2 x 9kg and 1 x 19kg washers done in 35min
3 x 19kg dryers on 17min cycle

title: (4000-198) Porto - 52 Rua de Entreparedes
description:
Marlin Wash
3 washing machines, 2 dryers

title: (4430-685) Vila Nova de Gaia - 15 Vereda da Fontinha
title_short: (4430-685) Vila Nova de Gaia - 15 Vereda da Fontinha
description: Parking next to the Mercadona in Vila Nova de Gaia, 30 minutes walk to the Luis I bridge, or you can take the metro in 5 minutes. Very quiet place and seems safe.

title: (4300) Porto - Av. Gustavo Eiffel
description: Free and wide parking next to a busy road in the center of Porto, next to the Douro. There is a small natural spring in the area, although it is somewhat inconvenient to access. It is not the best place but with light it looks nice.

title: (4300-059) Porto - Av. Gustavo Eiffel
description: Parking at the curb, directly on the edge of the Douro. Very safe because fishermen are there and there is a lot of pedestrian and car traffic.

title: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 1007 Rua de Raimundo de Carvalho
title_short: (4430-999) Vila Nova de Gaia - 1007 Rua de Raimundo de Carvalho
description: Clean, well-kept laundry with 3 washing machines and 3 dryers. Ironing service is also provided, but laundry is self-service. Coin exchange machine available. You cannot park there with the camper, but you can park at the nearest P on P4N and then a 4-minute walk.

title: (4000) Porto - 17 Rua da Conceição
description: Very central lavadaria and close to monuments.

title: (4300) Porto - 38B Praça da Alegria
description: Free, drinkable water. Free parking places (not a lot but still free), lots of shade and some stone banches.

title: (4000-526) Porto - 287 Av. de Rodrigues de Freitas
title_short: (4000-526) Porto - 287 Av. de Rodrigues de Freitas
description: Some relatively long parking spots under the shadow of trees. Good to park a van/small RV for a short visit to the city. Max. parking duration is 2h but you can buy a new ticket after this time. Shops/Cafes/Restaurants nearby.

title: (4300-059) Porto - 69 Largo Padre Baltasar Guedes
description: Parking in front of the official fire department building. Small impasse just below, a lot of shade, flat and relatively quiet at night. We stayed 2 nights. 1.5km walk from the center of Porto.

title: (4050-359) Porto - 78 Praça do Coronel Pacheco
description:
Payed parking close to the city centre. Perfect to explore Porto on a day trip. It's not suitable for big campers, but there is enough space for smaller ones like VW Bus, Ford Nugget and short Sprinter like vans. You can stay a maximum of 2h, but you can always come back and pay for another 2h.
There are some beggars that help on finding a spot and at the ticket machine. They look after the car if you give them some money, which worked for us at least.

title: (4400-492) Vila Nova de Gaia - 30F Cais do Lugan
title_short: (4400-492) Vila Nova de Gaia - 30F Cais do Lugan
description: Picturesque spot by Ponte de Arrábida - great sunset view to the marina and sunrise to the bridge. Stayed one night, little bit noisy but felt safe.

title: (4300-385) Porto - Av. Gustavo Eiffel
description: Parking space under the trees and near the gas station. Along the Douro River

title: (4400-514) Vila Nova de Gaia - 231 Rua Nova de Alvites
title_short: (4400-514) Vila Nova de Gaia - 231 Rua Nova de Alvites
description: Lidl parking lot with partial roofing. WiFi and toilet during opening hours. Feels safe with cameras, we heard about broken windows on a few other spots.

title: (4150-564) Porto - 215 Via Panorâmica Edgar Cardoso
description: Parking close to university campuses.

title: (4430-300) Vila Nova de Gaia -
description: Somewhat secluded large parking lot at the stadium, with Uber for 5€ to the centre, open 7 a.m. to 8 p.m.

title: (4300-197) Porto - 159 Rua do Conde de Ferreira
title_short: (4300-197) Porto - 159 Rua do Conde de Ferreira
description: Street parking for nominal fee (free on the weekend!!)… up to 4hrs… Some long bays between trees, I’m an L4H3 and got in comfortable… - not suitable for ‘proper’ motorhomes, just vans I think. If you come to this location, then neighbouring streets have lots of bays similar! About a 15min walk to the center but lots of cafes on way!

title: (4400-584) Vila Nova de Gaia - 15 Praceta de São Pedro
title_short: (4400-584) Vila Nova de Gaia - 15 Praceta de São Pedro
description: Perfect parking to leave the vehicle to go to the port. you can spend the night

title: (4400-434) Vila Nova de Gaia - 50 Rua Abílio de Azevedo
title_short: (4400-434) Vila Nova de Gaia - 50 Rua Abílio de Azevedo
description: The green and tree-lined esplanade is not very quiet at least because next to a bus stop that leaves you in downtown Porto, ideal for visiting the city

title: (4400-514) Vila Nova de Gaia - 171 Rua Nova de Alvites
title_short: (4400-514) Vila Nova de Gaia - 171 Rua Nova de Alvites
description: Self-service laundry.

title: (4000-269) Porto - 331 Rua de Gonçalo Cristóvão
description: Is an underground parking with up to 2,3mts

title: (4300) Porto -
description: Public shower and laundry, shower, toilets. a washing machine

title: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - 40 Travessa de Sá
title_short: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - 40 Travessa de Sá
description: Fountain with drinking water

title: (4000) Porto - 219 Rua de Gonçalo Cristóvão
description: Parking on the street. Space under the aerial street of 6m long.

title: (4150-178) Porto - Rua do Campo Alegre 439
description: SABA - Campo Alegre parking space.

title: (4430-316) Vila Nova de Gaia - Marginal Areinho
title_short: (4430-316) Vila Nova de Gaia - Marginal Areinho
description:
Large parking lot with bar, toilet and shower (on the beach) and quiet. A few fishermen and hikers. View of the Douro.
It is better to approach with large motorhomes via Torre Bella east of the A4!

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - Rua da Praia
title_short: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - Rua da Praia
description: Free parking along the river, spots on the road and a small parking area on the river. Free parking, parked here day and night with no issues, asked a local security guard and he said it was no problem to park here. Can get busy at night if they have a show down at the river. Otherwise fine. No services.

title: (4050-021) Porto - 71 Rua do Melo
description: Parking fee limited to 4 hours a day

title: (4000) Porto - Largo da Lapa
description: Safe and quiet area to spend the day . In the Church area paid parking.

title: (4400-493) Canidelo - 907 Rua Estamparia de Lavadores
description: Quiet place close to two supermarkets, laundry, post office, health station and cafes.

title: (4150-430) Porto - 172 Rua João Martins Branco
description: Quiet place Next Boavista

title: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - 280 Rua Laborim
title_short: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - 280 Rua Laborim
description: Natural water point (wash house), ideal for washing clothes and / or filling jerrican.

title: (4430) Oliveira do Douro - 340 Alameda Areinho
description: A little complicated place to get to but quite a quiet place to spend the night. They have a shower service schedule. In summer it is much more crowded than in winter, autumn. It takes 30 minutes to walk from there to the part where the wineries are.

title: (4300) Porto - 495 Rua de Barros Lima
description: Good possibility to park the motorhome, for a trip to the city center of Porto. The parking lot is right next to the cemetery Bonfim. The city center is about 2 km walk. To stay it is probably too loud and a bit weird. We parked here twice, saw other campers park here and had great days in Porto. No service and no restrictions.

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - R. da Praia
title_short: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - R. da Praia
description: Busy place day and night. but good view in front of Douro river don't have shower toilet or any other facilities.

name: Istas Garden
title: (4405-519) Istas Garden
description: Camping Istas Garden, small familiar and relaxing camping, 2 kms from the beach and 8 kms from Oporto. All the pitches have access to (included) water, eletricity, barbecue area, fully equiped kitchen, living room and an indoor heated salted pool

title: (4150) Porto - 1492 Rua do Ouro
description: Small shady parking facing the sea, small tap of drinking water to fill only bottle, trash, container nearby and a service station at 200 m and bus stop a little noisy at night

title: (4300) Porto - 126 Travessa das Eirinhas
description: Parking next to a hospital. Quiet, 30-40 minutes walk from the city center. very wide parking with several sectors. Makes a good impression with the naked eye. No problem as we read about the surroundings.

title: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - Rua da Pedra Salgada
title_short: (4430) Vila Nova de Gaia - Rua da Pedra Salgada
description: Perfect place to sleep or spend a day. Quite large with many squares. not a single noise.

title: (4050-221) Porto - 449 Rua de Alves Redol
description: Just a parking space

title: (4300-241) Porto - 54 Rua Conselheiro Correia de Barros
title_short: (4300-241) Porto - 54 Rua Conselheiro Correia de Barros
description: Parcking space in a dead end street, very calm during night and day. There is an elementary school beside, so it may be noisy during the day when hollydays are over. It is not far from the city center, not far from a bouldering hall! a lot of cars are parked, but during the 2 days we where there, there was always some free space.

name: Parque Campismo Salgueiros
title: (4400-397) Parque Campismo Salgueiros
description:
Minimum stay 2 nights. Check in first, then wait for someone to take you to the pitch. It says that you can only use a minimal amount of electricity, otherwise everything will collapse (2A). Plumbing is old but clean. An option to stay in town for a visit. Bus 300m away, line 15, direct access to the center of Porto. WiFi at the reception.
Currently only after prior reservation by email.

title: (4405-853) Vila Nova de Gaia - 139 Rua Conselheiro Fonseca
title_short: (4405-853) Vila Nova de Gaia - 139 Rua Conselheiro Fonseca
description: Wash house

title: (4150-713) Porto - 331 Rua de Sobreiras
description: Free roadside parking, right on the estuary with views of Porto. Depending on the water level with a small river beach. The center can be reached on foot within 25 minutes (always along the water). Next door is an e-scooter parking lot, which makes it faster. About 200 m further in the direction of Porto you will find a park with fitness equipment. In the other direction there is a bathing beach. For me the perfect parking lot to spend time in Portugal. More suitable for vans.

title: (4150-044) Porto -
description: Free day night parking. Very noisy

title: (4405-856) Vilar do Paraíso - 90 Travessa Azenha
description:
Only parking. No services. Very quiet with green zone near to walk.
Picnic tables available.

title: (4050) Porto - 484 Rua de 5 de Outubro
description: Small parking suitable for mobile homes, height approx. 3.5m, nice private operator (can only speak Portuguese or French!), the gates are open from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m.

title: (4400-382) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2263 Avenida da Beira-Mar
title_short: (4400-382) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2263 Avenida da Beira-Mar
description: An ordinary parking lot on the beach next to a supermarket for a fresh breakfast and on the beach there are public toilets and showers. We have been there for 2 nights without any problems with a lot of other campers. We felt safe because we were there with so many of course. Fortunately, we did not suffer from burglary / window damage in this place, as you can read in almost all other places here on the app. If you face the beach and walk to the right, you will come across a bus stop for line 15 (it is nowhere but it stops there on the road) that goes to the famous bridge.

title: (4000-191) Porto - 139 Rua do Major David Magno
title_short: (4000-191) Porto - 139 Rua do Major David Magno
description:
Peaceful place. You will have a art school in the block, but they are cool people.
I stay there 3 days and nights and don't have complains, you will have a big market (lidl) and a café near by.
This place is nearby the center of porto.

title: (4400-382) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2020 Avenida da Beira-Mar
title_short: (4400-382) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2020 Avenida da Beira-Mar
description: A good emergency parking space for smaller vans. Due to the time, we didn't get a place on a campsite and we didn't feel safe in the suburbs. We were able to stand here the night without any worries and didn't attract attention with the closed pop-up roof. A shower can be found across the street. This is right on the beach.

title: (4400-353) Vila Nova de Gaia - 90 Rua Agro de Cima
title_short: (4400-353) Vila Nova de Gaia - 90 Rua Agro de Cima
description: Parking along the beach suitable for vans - very busy at night! It's quieter after 2 a.m. m. Accessible beach shower, public toilet from 9:30 am. m. Supermarket for breakfast on site.

name: ORBITUR Canidelo
title: (4400-382) ORBITUR Canidelo
description: Canidelo campsite. Pleasant campsite with excellent facilities. Spacious and clean toilets. Big pool. Please note that the poorly delimited pitches can be narrow if there is a large presence of motorhomes. Convenient, the bus stop for Porto is a 3-minute walk away. 1 bus every 1/4 hour until midnight.

title: (4405-736) Vila Nova de Gaia - R do Cerro
title_short: (4405-736) Vila Nova de Gaia - R do Cerro
description: Campismo da Madalena campsite. It is closed but you can park in its parking lot.

title: (4400-413) Vila Nova de Gaia - 363 Rua João Paulo II
title_short: (4400-413) Vila Nova de Gaia - 363 Rua João Paulo II
description: Parking by the way simple and comfortable

title: (4400-382) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2780 Avenida da Beira-Mar
title_short: (4400-382) Vila Nova de Gaia - 2780 Avenida da Beira-Mar
description: Water tap, at the level of an access to a restaurant and to the beach. Perfect for filling water barrels.

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - Afurada
description: Huge parking lot. Sea view on one side and Porto on the other. Overnight stay prohibited.

name: Parque de Campismo Marisol
title: (4405-717) Parque de Campismo Marisol
description: Campsite Marisol. the caretaker speaks French, unpretentious campsite but open all year round

title: (4350-085) Porto - 171 Rua Carlos Graça
description: A few parking spaces along a park. Slightly sloping. Glass bins at the end of the street, A little traffic during the day, little during the night. Lidl store approx. 500m bus station to get to the city center. May be suitable for 2-3 nights.

title: (4420-521) Valbom - 201 N108
description: Parking on the banks of the Douro with a view of the river, bridges and Porto in the background. Entrances and exits in the direction of Porto only and difficult to access for vehicles with pronounced overhangs and wheelbases! 10 seats. Start of walks along the Douro on foot or by bike.

title: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - Avenida da Beira-Mar
title_short: (4400) Vila Nova de Gaia - Avenida da Beira-Mar
description: Very nice place...awesome

title: (4300-340) Porto - 148 Travessa Bonjóia
description: From the sleeping area you have a wonderful view over Porto and the Campanha train station is only a 15-minute walk away. Unfortunately it is quite noisy because of the big street, but that didn't bother us.

title: (4405-735) Vila Nova de Gaia - 14 Rua Canide
title_short: (4405-735) Vila Nova de Gaia - 14 Rua Canide
description: Small corner 50m from the beach quiet a little wind anyway

title: (4430) Avintes - 3 Rua Esteiro
description: Place at the edge of the water ideal for motorhome of 7m40 and very calm while being lulled by the noise of the ocean. Narrow but very good, 10min from downtown and small restaurant 200m with very good country cuisine and very welcoming staff despite the language barrier.

title: (4350-226) Porto - 202 Rua do Monte Aventino
description: Free parking spot with space for our Mercedes’ sprinter. We parked here and stayed in an Airbnb in the centre for 3 days and it was perfect for that. I think it would be quiet to spend the night and quite flat. No longer vehicles than 6m I imagine

title: (4200) Porto - 369 Rua Oliveira Martins
description: Flat place to park and spend the night, seemingly quiet

title: (4200-604) Porto - 131 Rua Professor Joaquim Bastos
description: Quiet place in an urbanization, in front of lidl. Good to park during the day or spend the night quietly. 30 min walk from the center.

title: (4350-158) Porto - 2 Colónia Antero de Quental
description: Gas station with water. Sometimes stops flowing, but with patience we filled up our tank in maybe 15 min

title: (4405-738) Vila Nova de Gaia - 64 Rua Dos Combatentes
title_short: (4405-738) Vila Nova de Gaia - 64 Rua Dos Combatentes
description: Beach parking, under the main road axis, quiet, top to spend the night, 20 minutes from the center of Porto by car / truck .. Next to '' Vibraçōes Bar ''

title: (4200-105) Porto -
description:
Quiet avenue with free parking spaces.
 Near a supermarket (incl. Toilets and cash machine) and a lunchroom.
The public park / children's playground "Quinta do Covelo" and the metro station "Salgueiros" are both a 5 minute walk.

title: (4150) Porto - 382 Avenida de Dom Carlos I
title_short: (4150) Porto - 382 Avenida de Dom Carlos I
description: Quiet, free parking located next to a park, overlooking the river, 10 minutes from the beach of Matusinhos and 15 minutes from downtown Porto and where you can sleep or rest quietly.

title: (4250-316) Porto - 309 Rua do Monte dos Burgos
title_short: (4250-316) Porto - 309 Rua do Monte dos Burgos
description: Excellent free parking area, well located. Without disturbing anyone. No clean waters, no dirty waters.

title: (4430) Avintes - 446 Rua Areinho
description: Close to town, dirt parking. Good for a night out. Close to the river.

title: (4150) Porto - 382 Avenida de Dom Carlos I
title_short: (4150) Porto - 382 Avenida de Dom Carlos I
description: Parking on the banks of the Douro. At the mouth of the Douro. August Fort Sao da Foix. Tennis clay court, small park with mini golf and beach. Fishing on the dike.

title: (4150-570) Porto - 9 Esplanada do Castelo
description: Just 100 meters from the ocean some car passages in the night but relatively quiet. you have to arrive in the evening to be sure to find some space. We spent 2 days, 2 nights without being disturbed.

title: (4405) Valadares - 96 Rua Loubet Bravo
description: Small hidden parking lot. Directly on the beach, somewhat sheltered from the wind but very nice. Unattended and rocky beach at low tide. I preferred this quiet location to other noisy car parks. The square is passable from two sides. From the "right" side it is super passable from the "left" side, but only with good four-wheel drive because there is a lot of deep sand here. Nevertheless, many campers find a place right by the sea.

title: (4430) Avintes - 704 Rua Areinho
description: We had spent a first night on the pier a little higher. For our 2nd night we went down to the beach. You will find barbecue, table, clean public toilets, beach shower... the place stays clean. Despite a large attendance by residents on August 15, we were able to sleep there calmly.

title: (4420) Valbom - 119 Rua Clube Naval Infante Dom Henrique
title_short: (4420) Valbom - 119 Rua Clube Naval Infante Dom Henrique
description: Safe place. Next to a park with a children's area (toys, zip line, climbing). Near the Douro River (river beach and promenade), bar and bathroom.

address.street: 119 Rua Clube Naval Infante Dom Henrique

title: (4200-021) Porto - 7 Rua Agra do Amial
description: Clothes laundry. Clothes basket

title: (4430-767) Avintes - 846 Rua Areinho
description: Public beach shower next to a bathing beach, BBQ stations and a small soccer field. Great Portuguese snack bar with pool table and outdoor area 200m up the road.

title: (4150-671) Porto - 178 Rua da Senhora da Luz
title_short: (4150-671) Porto - 178 Rua da Senhora da Luz
description: Self-service laundry

title: (4150) Porto - 131 Alameda Doutor Fernando Azeredo Antas
title_short: (4150) Porto - 131 Alameda Doutor Fernando Azeredo Antas
description: Parking near the beaches in the north of Porto. shops and bus at the end of the street

title: (4430-867) Avintes - 86 Rua Paço
description: It's next to the road. It's not on the ground next door because we could not get in because of the puddles. Next to Del Río, an avenue. Very calm. A little noise if cars pass quickly.

title: (4100-431) Porto - 59 Rua Teixeira de Vasconcelos
description: A very quiet pine forest to park and be alone. Spacious, quiet and shaded. It is located next to a cemetery, otherwise it is perfect to spend the day. Close to parks and easy access.

title: (4150) Porto - 76 Rua Grão Magriço
description: Very quiet parking day

title: (4100-062) Porto - 17 Rua de António Aroso
description: Place with many squares, at night there are few cars parked. Peaceful place. During the day, all the parking lots are almost full. There will be a lot of people therefore, if someone wanted to do something bad, they would be seen. In front of a park, bus stop and next to the road.

title: (4150-153) Porto - 446 Avenida do Brasil
description: NO parking. Just to indicate a public toilet on the beach promenade. Costs are 0,50ct.

title: (4100-376) Porto - 279 Avenida do Parque
description: Calm place and with enough green air and trees to park. Fica weekends more cheio because of the park that I have visited. The final year of the street in the park Saturday pela manhã has a fair of Bio products, cafes and restaurants. Excellent

title: (4150) Porto - Rua do Molhe 403
description: Free parking for about 10-15 motorhomes. No services. Quiet place, no traffic noise, 30m there is a bus stop. About 15 minutes from the beach and Parque da Cidade. We spent 2 nights here with no problem.

title: (4100) Porto - 64 Beco Carreiras
description: Parking lanes in a neat environment. We slept relatively peacefully here. Nevertheless, we would come back here because it seems safe and is right on the edge of the Parque da cidade di Porto. Overnight stay apparently tolerated. no problems. and the morning can start with a wonderful coffee from the "Soundwich" restaurant...

title: (4460-282) Porto - 12364 Estrada da Circunvalação
description: Parking, no payment. NorteShopping Shopping Center

title: (4460-282) Senhora da Hora - 15 Praceta da Aldeia Nova
title_short: (4460-282) Senhora da Hora - 15 Praceta da Aldeia Nova
description: Nice place to park near Norte shopping centre, where it is very difficult to park large vans, Residencial area where I found a few motorhomes parked.

title: () Porto -
description: Free toilets with the option of a shower (probably only open morning/afternoon) in the center of Parque da Cidade de Porto, a few minutes from Matosinhos beach and Castelo del Queijo. Access to the park is on foot and you can have a picnic or spend the afternoon/day on any side of the meadows. In the surroundings there are several car parks where it is not necessary to pay.

title: (4460-161) Senhora da Hora - 584 Avenida Senhora da Hora
title_short: (4460-161) Senhora da Hora - 584 Avenida Senhora da Hora
description: Good to sleep over night. Next to public transport metro.

title: (4430-812) Avintes - 176 Rua Cunha
description: RV park in Gaia Biological Park. 9 separate pitches in a very beautiful green, peaceful and quiet environment. electricity and sewerage. Ideal for visiting Porto. Direct buses to the center of Porto. One of the most beautiful parks. This price includes the visit to the biological park (animals, eagles, storks, deer, bison,...). Only for motorhomes with toilet/shower on board. Arrivals are only possible during the opening hours of the Park Biologico. 9am-7pm

title: (4100) Porto - 94 Rua de Cabo Verde
description: Quiet parking near the ocean and its large paths and the large park. Near Montevideu Avenue and Boavista. Very good for a quiet night very close to Porto.

title: (4465) São Mamede de Infesta - 55 Rua Maria Feliciana
title_short: (4465) São Mamede de Infesta - 55 Rua Maria Feliciana
description: Good place to stay and sleep

title: (4100) Porto - N12
description: Picnic tables under trees. There is a parking lot just opposite, very convenient to unload the things to eat. In the park there are public toilets and a fountain.

title: (4450) Porto - 15282 Estrada da Circunvalação
description:
One of the safest places I found yet in Porto. stayed there for the night without a problem. 

You can find toilets, drinking water and outsider shower in the park. 

Pretty nice calm place close to the Matosinhos beach.

title: (4450) Porto - 15322 Estrada da Circunvalação
description: Good spot near tennis court with access to the forest

title: (4465-004) Pedrouços - 119 Rua das Cavadas
description: Shady parking all morning. There is a park very close. There were almost no cars, I think it's a university area. We have been very calm

title: (4100) Porto - 71 Rua Particular Nº 2 Castelo do Queijo
title_short: (4100) Porto - 71 Rua Particular Nº 2 Castelo do Queijo
description:
We stayed here over night, only 5 minutes to the beach and right next to a park. 
It's next to the big road but very quiet. A stray dog kept us company, he was a little annoying but other than that a great place to stay for the night especially because of the location!

address.street: 71 Rua Particular Nº 2 Castelo do Queijo

title: (4425) Pedrouços - 26 Rua Rodrigues de Freitas
description: Nice to pass

title: (4430) Avintes - 37 Rua Marco do Cardal
description: On the back of Lidl, we spent one night . You can use the free wifi from the supermarket. there are many good spots around Lidl.

title: (4460-282) Senhora da Hora - Travessa António Domingues dos Santos
title_short: (4460-282) Senhora da Hora - Travessa António Domingues dos Santos
description: Parking 150 places, 300m from metro senhora da hora

title: (4100-429) Porto - 395 Via do Castelo do Queijo
title_short: (4100-429) Porto - 395 Via do Castelo do Queijo
description: Parking during the day without problems. Day trip to the city and bathing in the sea. Possibility to rent an electric scooter on site via app.

title: (4405-630) Lagos - 218 Travessa Capitão Carrilho
description: Parking near the beach. No height limit. Quiet to spend a night and go to the beach.

title: (4435-485) Rio Tinto - 164 Avenida da Conduta
description:
Self Service laundromat with 3 Washers from 11kg to 20kg and also 3 Dryers.
cash or card accepted. 
snack machine with online payment only (water, juices and snacks).
WI FI available and power plug.

title: (4405) Vila Nova de Gaia - 282 Alameda do Senhor da Pedra
title_short: (4405) Vila Nova de Gaia - 282 Alameda do Senhor da Pedra
description: A very quiet and nice place to park. During the day, you may also visit the beautiful chapel of “Senhor da Pedra”

title: (4405-632) Vila Nova de Gaia - 166 Rua Comandante Carvalho Araújo
title_short: (4405-632) Vila Nova de Gaia - 166 Rua Comandante Carvalho Araújo
description: Level parking with large spaces in the center of it. Good access. Next to park and restoration. Showers on the beach, at least in the summer season. We have had a quiet night.

title: (4510-113) Jovim - 548 Rua dos Praia
description: A place where you can park and walk until the little beach near the acess and enjoy  a quiet day.

title: (4435-481) Rio Tinto - 53 Alameda da Boavista
description: Automatic laundry good access, easy parking on the street. Excellent, pharmacy, supermarket and bakery

title: (4100) Porto - Praça da Cidade do Salvador
title_short: (4100) Porto - Praça da Cidade do Salvador
description: Parking 15 places around the anemone roundabout, very popular during the day, but close to beaches and restaurants.  There is a bicycle shop across the street.

title: (4510) Fânzeres - 364 Travessa Manariz Baixo
description: Park next to passadicos de fanzeres

title: (4510-001) Jovim - 1779 Rua da Aldeia
description: A quiet stop on the Douro.  A small passage on this little road as there is direct access to a small beach. Small snack, ice cream. No service. Forbidden to stay overnight.

title: (4430-769) Avintes - 60 Rua Azenha
description:
A park next to the beach, you can spend a few hours. 
It has a bar near the beach if you need toilets or drinks.

title: (4410-406) Arcozelo - 901 Avenida João Paulo II
description: Quiet place next to a park with the possibility of picnics. Further down, there is a pedestrian path that leads to the Miramar beach. Nice.

title: (4450-084) Matosinhos - 670 Rua Brito e Cunha
description: Free parking space at the foot of the Sheraton hotel, secured by its CCTV cameras. Park just in front, with the beach 2 min walk. Quiet night. Arrived after dinner to find a seat is advised.

title: (4450-108) Matosinhos - 22 Rua de Damão
description: Great parking lot to overnight. I stayed a couple nights here and I will be back for sure. It’s really spacious and next to a school (which gives me a sense of security). Free parking

title: (4450-208) Matosinhos - Avenida Norton de Matos
description: Parking along the paved avenue that runs along the beach. Ideal for enjoying the beach or strolling along the coast. Free toilets in the mall, beach shower without soap. Avoid coming in the day to have a place. Rather quiet at night but cars can pass close.

title: (4415-135) Pedroso - 6 Rua Nova da Raposa
description: LPG petrol station. We had our French propane bottle refilled with LPG without worries, the person who served us had an adapter.

title: (4350-414) Porto - R. Do Repelão
description: Place near a service area that is also a Park and Ride with metro Fanzeres right in front with a Mercadona near. This area is bigger and have less CC and AC than the other one, so it is a good alternative if it is full or with too much noise.

title: (4510-591) Fânzeres - 22 Rua Lordelo
description: Perfect place to spend the night and visit the city's train station a two-minute walk away

title: (4410-371) Arcozelo - 218 Rua Caminho Ribeiro
description: This is now a horse training ground, not sure if you can stay here! Quiet place and close to nature, right in the middle of Arcozelo. Open to everyone 24h

title: (4510-036) Jovim - Av. Beira Rio
description: Place to park 1 or 2 trucks or motorhomes (but not too big). We preferred this place to the other side as peaceful at night and not frequented by young people at night. Just 1 fisherman or 2. We spent a quiet night without noise, apart from the usual barking of Portuguese dogs from time to time (you will have to explain to me why in this country we hear dogs barking every night everywhere where we go !!)

title: (4450-271) Matosinhos - 256 Rua Sendim
description: Open parking and very large. There are a lot of street lights and a lot of passing close enough but we had two quiet nights without any problems.

title: (4450) Matosinhos - 25 Rua Misericórdia
description: Quiet parking lot near the port of Porto. Very empty on weekends, full during the day during the week. We stayed here for two nights. Many good restaurants about 1.2 km away, also beach and bus stop. Supermarket around the corner. A playground is next to the parking lot.

title: (4435-127) Venda Nova - 179 Avenida Professor Doutor Anibal Cavaco Silva
title_short: (4435-127) Venda Nova - 179 Avenida Professor Doutor Anibal Cavaco Silva
description:
Area opposite the tram station. In 25 minutes you are in the city center.
Drinking water and drainage of gray and black water. During the day there are a lot of cars, so it is better to arrive in the evening.

address.street: 179 Avenida Professor Doutor Anibal Cavaco Silva

title: (4435-127) Rio Tinto - 14 Rua Doutor Armando José Pereira Tavares
title_short: (4435-127) Rio Tinto - 14 Rua Doutor Armando José Pereira Tavares
description: Laundry service with 3 machines (9kg  = 4,5 euro + 13 kg = 6 euro + 18 kg = 9 euro).  Drying 3 machines à 18 kg. Nice place. You need to buzz yourself in on a switch on the right side of the door. There’s seats for you to sit while waiting and some tables to fold your clothes on. They have a free Wi-Fi. They have a money changer machines that takes 5, 10 and 20 euro bills.

address.street: 14 Rua Doutor Armando José Pereira Tavares

title: (4410-413) Arcozelo - 10 Praceta Gomes Guerra
description: Dead end in a quiet residential area. we stayed here for one night during the week without a hitch. possibility for imposing motorhome. 2 to 3 locations maximum. a little opposite with the surrounding accommodation but at the end of August a lot of unoccupied residences.

title: (4450) Matosinhos - 30 Rua Heróis de França
description: Docapesca private parking. Ideal for visiting the typical restaurants of the region and the beach of Matosinhos. The nearby metro station leading to the center of Porto

title: (4460) Maciel - 75 Rua Ana Augusta Neves Teixeira
title_short: (4460) Maciel - 75 Rua Ana Augusta Neves Teixeira
description: Parking near the metro. ideal for visiting Porto, it takes about 15 minutes by metro to reach the center. we felt safe. we spent 2 very quiet nights.

title: (4425-193) Águas Santas - Avenida de Dom António Ferreira Gomes
title_short: (4425-193) Águas Santas - Avenida de Dom António Ferreira Gomes
description: Quiet place, in a building street. Surrounded by trees, close to many buses. Forbidden to stay the night

address.street: Avenida de Dom António Ferreira Gomes

title: (4470) Gueifães - 1201 Rua Luís da Silva Neves
title_short: (4470) Gueifães - 1201 Rua Luís da Silva Neves
description: Electricity of water pump

title: (4450-620) Leça da Palmeira - 433 Avenida Antunes Guimarães
title_short: (4450-620) Leça da Palmeira - 433 Avenida Antunes Guimarães
description: Self-service laundry.

name: Agra Pet Campsite
title: (4475-304) Agra Pet Campsite
description:
Agra Pet Campsite is here to welcome you and your pets! ?
There are 7 slots for tents and 2 for vans (max. length 5.5m)

title: (4410-462) Arcozelo - 2 Rua Doutor Alfredo Dias
description: Very not recommended place to spend the night, it can save you in case of need but there are better places nearby.

title: (4415-694) Olival - 80 Largo São Mateus
description:
Right next to Café Sá, in the pretty village of Arnelas, public toilets and showers, at least open during the day. Possible hot water in the showers (not tested).

Garbage cans and parking nearby.

title: (4460-710) Custóias -
description: A place for temporary accommodation, free of charge and right next to the metro that goes straight to Porto. Seems pretty sure to me personally.

title: (4450-718) Leça da Palmeira - 65 Avenida Liberdade
description: Place along the avenue de la Liberté, next to the beach (sand and rock), public shower at the beach, restaurants-bar nearby. Calme

title: (4515-649) Foz do Sousa - 120 Rua Beira Rio
title_short: (4515-649) Foz do Sousa - 120 Rua Beira Rio
description: The descent is very difficult!!!!! vehicles more than 5 mt. mission Impossible. the output is even worse!!!!! experienced drivers only!!!!

title: (4410) São Félix da Marinha - Granja
description: 15 km from Porto, Praia Granja, facing the ocean, parking lot along the seawall, still free spaces around 3 p.m., set down for the afternoon, saw no prohibition signs. Small vehicle only

title: (4450-590) Leça da Palmeira - 81 Rua Armando Leça
title_short: (4450-590) Leça da Palmeira - 81 Rua Armando Leça
description: Large, easy-access car park, many places available when we parked, no prohibition sign.

title: (4410-178) São Félix da Marinha - 2665 Avenida República
title_short: (4410-178) São Félix da Marinha - 2665 Avenida República
description: Sao Félix avenue de la République facing the sea. Tranquility and magnificent views, possibility of long walks by the sea. No service. No photos taken because arrival at night and morning rain and fog.

title: (4510) Valongo - 407 Rua Tenente Sá Nogueira
description: Right by the old abandoned sanatorium. Great view. ATTENTION - Access is only possible via the main road (N209) R.Cesario Verde! The access road is in good condition. You can park directly in front of the entrance or a little further up. Since it is a lost place, there is unfortunately a lot of rubbish lying around. However, you have a beautiful view.

title: (4470-177) Maia - 248 Rua Ângela Adelaide Calheiros Carvalho Meneses
title_short: (4470-177) Maia - 248 Rua Ângela Adelaide Calheiros Carvalho Meneses
description:
Self-service laundry
 Convenient to park in front

address.street: 248 Rua Ângela Adelaide Calheiros Carvalho Meneses

title: (4410-113) São Félix da Marinha - 716 Rua Estação
title_short: (4410-113) São Félix da Marinha - 716 Rua Estação
description: Laundry Selfservice

title: (4440-589) Valongo - Rua de R. Nossa Sra. dos Chãos
title_short: (4440-589) Valongo - Rua de R. Nossa Sra. dos Chãos
description: Nice big parking lot at the chapel. Attention : Max. 3.5 tons. The driveway is quite steep but in very good condition. You have a nice view down. There's a bit of rubbish everywhere.

address.street: Rua de R. Nossa Sra. dos Chãos

title: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 750 Rua das Águas
title_short: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 750 Rua das Águas
description: Small picnic area at the edge of De Sousa River. We heard no one during the night and no one came before 10am. Only 15-20 minutes from the center of Porto it is very convenient. Possibility to swim in the river. Attention arrive well by the Ruas das Aguas because the gps can make come by a dirt road at the exit of the A43.

title: (4410-141) São Félix da Marinha - 120 Rua Moínho de Vento
title_short: (4410-141) São Félix da Marinha - 120 Rua Moínho de Vento
description: Small open space at the end of a cul-de-sac. Access via dirt road easily possible. Relatively beautiful view of the sea and the small stream, very quiet. Space for 4-5 campers

title: (4440) Valongo - Rua de Couce
description: Parking at the entrance of the "Serras do Porto" path. Be careful to access it by crossing the village not to have a large motorhome. An L2H2 master passes. The parking lot is small...4 places maximum. And it is a parking lot for hiking departures, going to the climbing site, etc.

title: (4410-178) São Félix da Marinha - 35 Rua Loureiros
title_short: (4410-178) São Félix da Marinha - 35 Rua Loureiros
description: 3 large blue areas mark this motorhome site. We stayed here for 1 night, alone. A lot of traffic noise, but if you are not bothered by it, this is a great place. Well in full sun. 1.1 km from train station. Train goes directly to Sao pento, the terminal station in the center of Porto

title: (4450) Leça da Palmeira - 65 Avenida Liberdade
description: Perfect place to spend the night. Quiet and close to the beach. Good views. No services but there is a bar nearby.

title: (4515-162) Foz do Sousa - 102 Rua da Escola Velha
title_short: (4515-162) Foz do Sousa - 102 Rua da Escola Velha
description: Good local. Very good!

title: (4445-416) Ermesinde - 3 Rua Ponte dos Moinhos
description: Ample free parking in the center of Ermesinde. Quiet for day and night. Wc payment. the water is very polluted. Children's park.

title: (4440) Valongo - Corredor Ecológico
description: Dusty spot by a river in the middle of the nature, shady and  nearby a small settlement. Not suitable for large vehicles (max length 7m max width 2m). Steep and narrow access with bad route.

title: (4470) Moreira - 6 Rua Primeiro de Maio
description: Good parking Park & ​​Ride located directly (20m) on the purple metro line E at the airport (3 stations) or Porto. We spent one night in early November looking for someone at the airport and we felt very comfortable there. Parking was in our time only a little busy but for the big WoMo it's pretty tight. The metro ticket, which you can buy by machine with money or a credit card has a value of 60 cents and can still be charged to the machine. You need to determine how many areas you want to drive and how many people. The ticket must be activated at the yellow terminal before the trip and go to another line. The terminal also shows how long it is still valid.

title: (4450) Leça da Palmeira - Avenida Liberdade
description: Suitable for the night. He has a local chill out at the seaside to take something calm while the sun goes down. In your back is the refinery although at night with all these lights, it has its charm although its noise can be embarrassing for some people.

title: (4455-494) Perafita - 4572 Estrada Nacional 107
description: Restaurant private parking nice owner, 3 min. from Porto airport again and again

title: (4440) Valongo - Corredor Ecológico
description: Place in nature and easy access. A large flat land ideal for motorhome. Some rubbish but beautiful quiet place with some trails in the middle of the forest. Path wide enough paved. No services.

title: (4415) Crestuma - 81 Estrada Penedo
description: Parking bay directly on the Douro river. It is not an official car park but as the road ends at a cafe/restaurant/kayak rental there is no traffic other than guests. Space for 2-3 cars. We had a quiet night and woke up to a beautiful river view. ☀️

title: (4415-616) Crestuma - 16 Rua Fontinha
description: A beautiful place to be at night.  A place with a lot of movement for the summer, in the spring a little movement and in the winter very quiet.  In winter a small cafe is open and the Marquês das Francesinhas only opens a few hours during the day.  Very quiet place in winter.

title: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 3715 Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
title_short: (4515) Foz do Sousa - 3715 Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
description:
Shady parking spot near the Douro River.

There's a bar upstairs and some granit tables. Relatively flat area. Calm except for the road and some fishermen.

title: (4455-467) Perafita - 745 Rua da Guarda
description: Fill up all gas bottles from all countries!!! also the small 2.75kg campingaz. was our last resort.

title: (4470-558) Moreira - 1509 Avenida do Aeroporto
description: Parking space in front of a hotel.  Place recommended by the people we rented the van from.
